Html:
I uninstalled Chirpy from VS2010 a while ago, but when I right click on .less files in VS2010 i still see three Chirpy context menu options: 

  • Chirpy minifier file
  • Chirpy CSSLint 
  • Chirpy JSHint 

 

How do I completely uninstall Chirpy? What other settings, registry keys or anything else might Chirpy have left behind?

Normally context menu is remove "OnDisconnection" .

"Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded."

Context menu options is set in :

Menu : "Tools"

Item : "Customize..."

Tab : "Commands"

Context menu : "Project and Solution Context Menus | Item"
